content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal Mine at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1)

### Iron Plate Factory at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z1)
- Inserter (position a) that puts into assembling machine

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough of the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, to craft an Iron Gear Wheel, you need 2 iron plates.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
